summary: Tech includes a range of resources that delve into technology's impact on various fields. The main profile featured is of Jan Hein Hoogstad, a self-taught software architect and entrepreneur with experience in improving team performance through technology. He is the Chief Product Officer at Varias and creator of the Superconnectors event. Jan Hein has also worked as a researcher and teacher, and is involved in the Public Spaces coalition.
excerpt: Jan Hein Hoogstad is an entrepreneur and software architect focusing on technology's role in improving team performance. He is CPO at Varias and creator of the Superconnectors event.
